service.name: importAddressMatchMapCsv
service.description: Import a CSV (name,value) of AddressMatchMap records

service.name: setPartyStatus
service.description: Set the party status. Requires PARTYMGR_STS_UPDATE permission. The change to statusId must be defined in StatusValidChange, otherwise this service will fail. The result is the original statusId, so that ECA conditions can check if a status has actually changed.

service.name: createPartyNote
service.description: Create a note item and associate with a party. If a noteId is passed, creates an assoication to that note instead.

service.name: linkPartyRecord
service.description: Merges customer accounts and disabled the duplicate

service.name: createPartyRole
service.description: Create a Party Role (add a Role to a Party). The logged in user must have PARTYMGR_CREATE or have permission to change the role of this partyId

service.name: deletePartyRole
service.description: Delete a Party Role (remove a Role from a Party). The logged in user must have PARTYMGR_DELETE or have permission to change the role of this partyId

service.name: ensurePartyRole
service.description: Ensure that the party is in the specified role.

service.name: ensureNaPartyRole
service.description: Ensure that the party is in the _NA_ role.

service.name: ensureNaPartyRoleFrom
service.description: Ensure that the party is in the _NA_ role.

service.name: ensureNaPartyRoleTo
service.description: Ensure that the party is in the _NA_ role.

service.name: createPartyRelationship
updatePartyRelationship
deletePartyRelationship
createPartyRelationshipType
service.description: Create a new Party Relationship type

service.name: findPartyFromEmailAddress
service.description: Find the partyId/contactMechId for a specific email address, if not found do not return a value

service.name: copyPartyContactMechs
service.description: Copies all contact mechs from the partyIdFrom to the partyIdTo. Does not delete or overwrite any contact mechs.

service.name: createContactMechAttribute
service.description: create a contact mech attribute record

service.name: updateContactMechAttribute
service.description: updates a contact mech attribute record

service.name: removeContactMechAttribute
service.description: removes a contact mech attribute record

service.name: createPartyDataSource
service.description: Creates a relation between a Party and a DataSource using PartyDataSource. The userLogin must have PARTYMGR_SRC_CREATE permission.

service.name: deleteCommunicationEvent
service.description: Delete a Communication Event, optionally delete the attached content and dataresource

service.name: deleteCommunicationEventWorkEffort
service.description: Delete a Communication Event, optionally delete the attached content and dataresource and when this is the only communication event connected to a workeffort delete the workeffort too.

service.name: createCommEventWorkEffort
service.description: Creates a WorkEffort entity and CommunicationEventWorkEff

service.name: markCommEventRead
service.description: Marks a communication event as read if in the entered/pending status

service.name: markMessageRead
service.description: Marks a communication event as read if in the entered/pending status

service.name: sendCommEventAsEmail
service.description: Sends a communication event as a single-part email using sendMail. All parameters come from CommunicationEvent, which must be of type EMAIL_COMMUNICATION. Will look for a contactMechIdTo to send the emails

service.name: sendEmailToContactList
service.description: Send emails to members of a contact list, wrapping each email in its own transaction and tagging each member that has been sent, so if the whole effort is aborted, it can start over from the middle. The max-retry is important because if this service is and some emails cannot sent, it will start again later and try again

service.name: setCommEventComplete
service.description: Sets the status of a communication event to COM_COMPLETE using the updateCommunicationEvent service

service.name: createPartyTextContent
service.description: Creates a Text Document DataResource and Content Records

service.name: uploadPartyContentFile
service.description: Upload and attach a file to a party

service.name: getPartyEmail
service.description: Get the main party Email address
